title: Moon Over Alcatraz
description: Following the death of their baby during a difficult birth, Brandy and Weston Chambers are grief-stricken and withdraw from each other, both seeking solace outside of their marriage; however, they vow to work through their painful disloyalty. But when the man Brandy slept with moves back to their hometown, three lives are forever changed by his return.Click here for more information:http://www.musapublishing.com/index.p...
author: Patricia Yager Delagrange
